item.title: 苹果发布 3 款 M5 家族新品
item.guid: 苹果发布-3-款-M5-家族新品
item.description:
Last night, Apple simultaneously launched three products equipped with the latest M5 processor: the MacBook Pro 14-inch, iPad Pro, and Vision Pro. The new products will go on sale on October 22. 昨晚，苹果一口气上架了三款搭载最新 M5 处理器的产品，分别为 MacBook Pro 14 寸、iPad Pro、Vision Pro，新品将于 10 月 22 日发售。

🔗 Related reading: Breaking! Apple releases 3 new products: very expensive, very powerful AI 🔗 相关阅读： 突发！苹果发布 3 款新品：价格很贵，AI 很强

M5 MacBook Pro 14-inch: Starting price 12999 RMB M5 MacBook Pro 14 寸：起售价 12999 元

Equipped with the base M5 processor featuring a 10+10 core specification, built on TSMC's 3nm process. According to charts on Apple's official website, this year's M5 offers 6.4 times the LLM prompt processing performance and 6.8 times the 3D rendering performance of the M1. 搭载 10+10 核规格的基础版 M5 处理器，基于 3nm 的台积电工艺打造。根据苹果官网的图表，今年 M5 的 LLM 提示词处理性能为 M1 的 6.4 倍、3D 渲染性能为 M1 的 6.8 倍。

Similar to the limitations of the M4 era, this M5 MacBook Pro still offers three memory options: 16/24/32GB, and the maximum optional hard drive has been upgraded to 4TB (minimum equipped with 512GB). 和 M4 时代的限制一样，这一次的 M5 MacBook Pro 仍然有 16/24/32GB 三档内存可选，最大可选的硬盘则升级到了 4TB（最低配备 512GB）。

The appearance remains consistent with the previous generation, featuring a 1600nits miniLED screen, with an optional anti-glare nano-texture glass version available. 外观则保持与前代一致，采用 1600nits 的 miniLED 屏幕，可以选配抗眩光的纳米纹理玻璃版本。

M5 iPad Pro: Starting price 8999 RMB M5 iPad Pro：起售价 8999 元

Also equipped with the new 10+10 core M5 processor, memory starts at 12GB (1T and 2T models come with 16GB). The appearance is identical to the previous generation, offering 11-inch and 13-inch versions with a dual-layer tandem OLED display. 同样搭载全新的 10+10 核规格 M5 处理器， 内存来到了 12GB 起步（1T 和 2T 配备 16GB）。外观与前代同样无差别，提供 11 英寸和 13 英寸两个版本选择，配备双层串联 OLED 显示屏。

M5 Vision Pro: M5 Vision Pro：

With the significant GPU performance improvements of the M5 processor mentioned earlier, this year's M5 Vision Pro, despite no changes in its exterior design, "offers faster performance, clearer system-wide details, and longer battery life." 搭配前文提到的 M5 处理器 GPU 性能大进步，今年的 M5 Vision Pro 虽然外形没有什么变化，但是「可提供更快的性能、更清晰的整个系统细节以及更长的电池续航时间」。

According to Apple Newsroom, the Vision Pro using the M5 processor can render 10% more pixels on screen than the previous generation, achieve a 120Hz refresh rate, and a minimum video latency of 12ms, taking realism to the next level. 根据苹果 Newsroom 的介绍，使用 M5 处理器的 Vision Pro 可以在屏幕上渲染比上一代多 10% 的像素数量、实现 120Hz 的刷新率以及最低 12ms 的视频延迟，真实性更上一层楼。

Apple also claims that the M5's internal 16-core neural engine can boost the performance of AI features in the system experience by up to 50% (such as converting spatial photos), and third-party apps also see significant speed improvements. 苹果还宣称，M5 内部的 16 核神经网络引擎可以让 AI 功能在系统体验上的运行速度提升高达 50%（比如转换空间照片），第三方 app 的运行速度也有显著提升。

In addition, the M5's excellent cost-effectiveness also brings the Vision Pro's typical usage battery life to 2.5 hours, while pure video playback can last for 3 hours. 此外，M5 优秀的性价比也让 Vision Pro 的普通使用续航来到了 2.5 小时，纯视频播放则可以坚持 3 小时

item.title: 始祖鸟承担「蔡国强烟花秀」赔偿修复责任
item.guid: 始祖鸟承担「蔡国强烟花秀」赔偿修复责任
item.description:
According to CCTV News, on October 15, the Shigatse City, Tibet investigation and verification team reported on the handling of the "Cai Guo-Qiang: Ascending Dragon" fireworks show. The report indicates: 据央视新闻报道，10 月 15 日，西藏日喀则市调查核查组通报《蔡国强：升龙》烟花秀调查处置情况。从通报内容显示：

    Emergency monitoring results for surface water points all met the Class II water quality standard of the "Environmental Quality Standards for Surface Water" (GB3838-2002);

    The concentrations of major characteristic pollutants at atmospheric monitoring points were all below the Class I zone limits of the "Ambient Air Quality Standards" (GB3095-2012);

    Leveling operations, human trampling, and vehicle compaction caused damage to the soil turf layer structure, with a damaged area of 15.29 mu;

    Fireworks residues, plastic debris, and other materials generated by the event were not thoroughly cleaned up;

    The instantaneous strong light and loud noise generated by the fireworks display caused short-term disturbance to wildlife.

The report concluded that this event was a human disturbance activity carried out in an ecologically sensitive plateau area, with its impact on the ecological environment manifesting as localized interference. Although the short-term direct pollution and damage were limited, potential ecological risks require monitoring and tracking. 报告认为，本次事件属于在高原生态敏感区实施的人为扰动活动，对生态环境的影响表现为局部干扰，其短期直接污染及破坏程度虽有限，但潜在的生态风险需监测跟踪。

Currently, Shigatse City has commissioned an assessment of ecological environment damage compensation, and based on the investigation of ecological environment damage: 目前，日喀则市已委托开展生态环境损害赔偿鉴定评估工作，根据生态环境损害调查情况：

    Legally pursue Beijing Cai Guo-Qiang Art Studio for ecological environment damage compensation and ecological restoration responsibilities. Relevant departments in Shigatse City will carry out long-term monitoring and post-assessment work.

    The "Arc'teryx" brand, as a sponsor of this event, shall legally bear corresponding responsibilities for ecological environment damage compensation and ecological restoration.

item.title: OpenAI 被曝 8 亿活跃用户只有 5% 付费
item.guid: OpenAI-被曝-8-亿活跃用户只有-5%-付费
item.description:
According to a recent report by the Financial Times, to fulfill its previous commitment of "investing over $1 trillion to build world-leading artificial intelligence," OpenAI is actively expanding new revenue streams, exploring debt cooperation models, and preparing for further fundraising through a five-year plan. 据《金融时报》日前报道，OpenAI 为实现此前许下的「投入超 1 万亿美元打造的世界领先人工智能」承诺，其正通过一个五年规划积极拓展新的收入来源、探索债务合作模式，并筹备进一步融资。

According to informed sources, OpenAI is planning to reach cooperation agreements by offering more customized product services to government and enterprise clients; meanwhile, it will generate additional revenue through newly launched shopping tools and promote the commercial sale of its video generation model Sora and AI agents. 据知情人士透露，OpenAI 正计划通过向政府和企业客户提供更多定制化产品服务来达成合作协议；同时，将借助新推出的购物工具创造额外收入，并推动其视频生成模型 Sora 以及 AI 智能体（AI agents）实现商业化销售。

Meanwhile, OpenAI is also weighing multiple avenues for "intellectual property monetization": developing new AI infrastructure, venturing into online advertising, and collaborating with former Apple chief design officer Jony Ive on AI consumer hardware. 同时，OpenAI 还在权衡多方面进行「知识产权变现」：开发新的 AI 基础设施、涉足在线广告、与苹果前首席设计官 Jony Ive 合作的 AI 消费级硬件。

It is reported that OpenAI's annual recurring revenue is approximately $13 billion, with 70% coming from consumers using ChatGPT. Notably, the report points out that while ChatGPT has over 800 million active users, only 5% are paid subscribers. OpenAI's goal is to double this proportion. 据悉，OpenAI 的年度经常性收入约为 130 亿美元，其中 70%来自使用 ChatGPT 的消费者。值得一提的是，报道指出 ChatGPT 虽然拥有超过 8 亿的活跃用户，但只有 5% 是付费订阅者。对此，OpenAI 的目标是将上述比例翻倍。

Currently, OpenAI has launched a low-cost subscription service "ChatGPT Go" in India and plans to replicate this strategy in other markets such as the Philippines and Brazil. 目前，OpenAI 已在印度推出低价订阅服务「ChatGPT Go」，并计划在菲律宾、巴西等其他市场复制该策略。

Last week, OpenAI CEO Sam Altman announced the latest ChatGPT data: weekly active users have reached 800 million. Altman stated at the conference: "Thanks to all users, AI has transformed from a tool people try and explore into a core platform for daily building and use." 上周，OpenAI CEO Sam Altman 公布了 ChatGPT 的最新数据：周活跃用户已达到 8 亿人次。Altman 在会上表示：「感谢所有用户，AI 已经从人们尝试和探索的工具，变成了日常构建和使用的核心平台。」

item.title: 京东与广汽宁德合作车型曝光
item.guid: 京东与广汽宁德合作车型曝光
item.description:
Recently, JD.com announced that it will partner with CATL and GAC Group to launch a "national good car," which will be officially released during the Double Eleven (Singles' Day) period and exclusively sold by JD.com. 日前，京东宣布将携手宁德时代、广汽集团推出一款「国民好车」，并将在双十一期间正式发布并由京东独家销售。

According to reports from Yicai and The Paper, the estimated price of the new car mentioned above is between 100,000 and 120,000 yuan. It is expected to adopt a "chocolate battery swap" model and is anticipated to be GAC Aion's UT battery swap version. 而据第一财经及澎湃新闻报道，上述提及的新车预估定价在 10 万元至 12 万元之间，有望将采取「巧克力换电」模式，预计为广汽埃安的 UT 换电版车型。

JD.com stated that it will fully integrate the advantageous capabilities of its partners in car manufacturing, battery sales and services, and other fields, promoting the upgrading of automotive consumption through innovations in consumption, production, and customization models. 京东方面表示，将全面整合合作方在造车、电池销售与服务等领域的优势能力，通过消费、生产、定制等模式创新，推动汽车消费升级。

It is reported that during the R&D process, this model focused on the three dimensions most concerning to users – safety, charging efficiency and range, and price – striving to find the optimal balance. Currently, users can search for "National Good Car" on the JD APP to book a test drive in advance. 据介绍，该车型在研发过程中重点围绕用户最关心的三大维度 —— 安全、充电效率与里程、价格，力求找到最佳平衡点。目前，用户可在京东 APP 搜索「国民好车」提前预约试驾。

It is worth mentioning that JD.com responded via Cailian Press, stating that the new car is jointly launched by three parties, with JD.com primarily providing user consumption insights and exclusive sales, not directly involved in the manufacturing process. 值得一提的是，京东方面通过财联社回应称，新车是三方联合推出，京东主要提供用户消费洞察和独家销售，不直接涉及制造环节。

item.title: 苹果在华启动 10 亿元新能源基金
item.guid: 苹果在华启动-10-亿元新能源基金
item.description:
Recently, Apple announced that over 90% of its manufacturing in China now uses renewable energy, with more than a hundred suppliers contributing to this progress. 日前，苹果宣布在中国超过 90% 的生产制造现已采用可再生能源，逾百家供应商共同促成了这一进展。

Apple stated that this milestone was achieved through a decade of close collaboration between the company and its suppliers, as both parties steadily advance towards the goal of fully using renewable energy for all Apple product production by 2030. 苹果方面表示，这一里程碑的达成，源于公司与供应商长达十年的紧密协作，双方正稳步推进到 2030 年前实现所有苹果产品生产全面使用可再生能源的目标。

Based on this progress, Apple also announced that its suppliers have jointly launched a new investment fund aimed at supporting the construction of renewable energy infrastructure in China. 基于此进展，苹果同时宣布其供应商已联合启动一项全新的投资基金，旨在支持中国可再生能源基础设施建设。

It is reported that the "China Renewable Energy Infrastructure Fund," with a total scale of 1 billion RMB (150 million USD), is entirely led by Apple suppliers and plans to add 1 million megawatt-hours of clean electricity to China's grid by 2030. 据悉，总规模达十亿元人民币（ 1.5 亿美元）的「中国可再生能源基础设施基金」完全由苹果供应商主导，并计划到 2030 年为中国电网新增 100 万兆瓦时的清洁电力。

This new China Renewable Energy Infrastructure Fund was jointly initiated by CICC Capital and Huaneng Investment, with battery supplier ATL participating as an anchor investor. Several Apple supply chain companies, including Pengding Holdings, Suzhou Dongshan Precision Manufacturing, Hon Hai Precision Industry, and YUTO Tech, have completed their equity investments. 这项全新的中国可再生能源基础设施基金由中金资本与华能投资联合发起，电池供应商 ATL 作为锚定投资者参与，包括鹏鼎控股、苏州东山精密、鸿海精密及裕同科技等在内的多家苹果供应链企业已完成投资入股。

Apple's Chief Operating Officer Sabih Khan stated, "Our suppliers in China are making rapid and outstanding progress in transitioning to renewable energy, and we are proud to work alongside them in this important endeavor." 苹果首席运营官 Sabih Khan 表示，「我们在中国的供应商正在向可再生能源转型方面取得快速且卓越的进展，我们很自豪能在这一重要工作中与他们携手同行。」

🔗 Related reading: An Aion that couldn't sell, branded as "JD Auto," becomes a "National Good Car"? 🔗 相关阅读： 一辆卖不动的埃安，贴上「京东汽车」的牌，就成了「国民好车」？

item.title: 理想 CEO：最快 3 年将实现全自动驾驶智能汽车
item.guid: 理想-CEO：最快-3-年将实现全自动驾驶智能汽车
item.description:
Yesterday, Li Xiang, CEO of Li Auto, reposted content from the "One Question" program he participated in and shared his personal predictions for the autonomous driving industry: 昨日，理想汽车 CEO 李想转发其参与的《一问》节目内容，并发布了个人对于自动驾驶行业的预测看法：

In as fast as 3 years, or conservatively 5 years, fully autonomous smart cars will be realized, becoming the largest AI terminals in the physical world. By 2030, smart car companies surpassing the scale of Apple iPhone may emerge. 最快 3 年，保守 5 年，全自动驾驶的智能汽车将会实现，这类汽车将成为物理世界最大的人工智能终端。到 2030 年，可能会出现超越苹果 iPhone 规模的智能汽车企业。

Li Xiang also stated last month that "advanced assisted driving must be available and should not incur usage fees." He noted that many advanced assisted driving features currently require consumers to pay additional usage fees, and these prices are not cheap, leading many consumers to not fully experience the convenience brought by the latest intelligent features. 而李想还曾在上个月表示「高阶辅助驾驶一定要有，而且不应该收使用费用。」其表示，现在不少高阶辅助驾驶需要消费者另行付使用费用，且价格不菲，导致不少消费者并没有充分感受到最新的智能化带来的用车便利。

He emphasized, "The use of advanced assisted driving should not be charged; it should allow more consumers in China and globally to experience the charm of artificial intelligence from China." 他强调，「高阶辅助驾驶的使用不应该收费，应该让更多中国乃至全球的消费者，感受来自中国的人工智能的魅力。」

item.title: 余承东发文让网友「猜新品」
item.guid: 余承东发文让网友「猜新品」
item.description:
Yesterday, Richard Yu, Huawei's Executive Director and CEO of Consumer BG, posted a teaser for a new product, asking netizens to "Guess what this is?" 昨日，华为常务董事、终端 BG 董事长余承东发帖预热新品，并让网友「猜猜这是啥？」

The images released by Richard Yu show that the product's most striking feature is the "Golden Mountain in Sunlight" design on the upper part – the upper half of the device is made of transparent material, with warm golden decorations resembling snow-capped mountains inside; the machine's color scheme is primarily black and gold. 从余承东公布的图片显示，产品最具亮点的就是上半部分的「日照金山」设计——机身上半部分由透明材料组成，内部则由类似雪山形状的暖金色装饰；机器配色以黑金为主。

According to a post by blogger "Nirvana FUN," they interacted in the WeChat Moments of He Gang, CEO of Huawei Consumer BG, guessing the new product to be a "high-end WiFi 7 router," to which He Gang replied with a "👍" emoji. 而据博主「涅槃 FUN」发文表示，自己在华为终端 BG 首席执行官何刚的朋友圈中进行互动，并猜测新品为「高端 WiFi 7 路由器」，随后何刚回复了「👍」的表情。

Additionally, many netizens in Richard Yu's comment section speculated it to be a "speaker." 另外，余承东的评论区有不少网友猜测为「音箱」。

item.title: 马斯克宣布下月全面用 AI 进行内容推荐
item.guid: 马斯克宣布下月全面用-AI-进行内容推荐
item.description:
Recently, Elon Musk posted that an updated version of X's feed recommendation algorithm (including model weights) will be released this week; by next month, X will implement a fully AI-based recommendation algorithm. 日前，马斯克发文表示，本周将会发布更新版 X 的信息流推送算法（包括模型权重）；而到了下个月，X 将实现完全基于 AI 的推荐算法。

Musk stated that over 100 million posts are generated on X daily, and in the future, all of them will be evaluated by Grok for corresponding interest recommendations. He emphasized that this will also greatly improve the quality of users' information feeds. 马斯克称，X 里每天产生超过 1 亿篇帖子，在未来将全部由 Grok 进行评估，并进行对应的兴趣推荐。其强调，这也将会极大提高用户的信息流质量。

Musk also revealed that X will soon introduce a feature for dynamically adjusting recommended content. 马斯克还透露，X 在不久后还将带来动态调整推荐内容功能。

Musk had previously complained about X's recommendation algorithm, and in May of this year, announced that the platform's recommendation algorithm was being replaced by a lightweight version of Grok's model. 此前马斯克就曾抱怨 X 的推送算法，并在今年 5 月宣布，平台的推荐算法正在被 Grok 的轻量版模型取代。

item.title: 💡 OpenAI 前主管：承认 AI 的真实性，才是人类未来的出路
item.guid: 💡-OpenAI-前主管：承认-AI-的真实性，才是人类未来的出路
item.description:
Recently, Jack Clark, former policy director at OpenAI and co-founder of Anthropic, published a personal blog post, warning people not to underestimate the potential and unknown nature of artificial intelligence. 日前，OpenAI 前政策总监、Anthropic 联合创始人 Jack Clark 发布了一篇个人博客，并警告人们不要低估人工智能的潜力和未知性。

In the article, Jack used his personal childhood experience as an example: Jack 在文中以个人童年经历作为例子：

As a child, in a dark room, I would see clothes on a chair, bookshelves, etc., as terrifying monsters. But once the lights were on and I saw the truth of the objects, the fear disappeared. 小时候在黑暗的房间里，会把椅子上的衣服、书架等看成是可怕的怪物。但开灯后看清楚了物品的真相，恐惧随之消失。

Regarding this, Jack believes that today, in 2025, the entire Earth is that dark room, and those 'monsters' are the powerful and unpredictable AI systems of today and the future. Unlike childhood, this time when we 'turn on the lights,' we find that these 'monsters' are real. 对此，Jack 认为，在 2025 年的今天，整个地球就是那个黑暗的房间，而那些「怪物」就是当今和未来强大且难以预测的 AI 系统。与童年不同的是，这次当我们「打开灯」时，发现这些「怪物」是真实存在的。

He pointed out that many people prefer to believe that these powerful AI systems are just ordinary, harmless tools, like 'a pile of clothes on a chair,' and at the same time hope everyone can turn off the lights and 'go back to sleep,' pretending everything is fine. 其指出，很多人宁愿相信这些强大的 AI 系统就像「椅子上的一堆衣服」一样，只是普通、无害的工具，同时还希望大家能关上灯「回去睡觉」，假装一切都没问题。

Jack, however, strongly opposes this view, emphasizing that what people are now facing is a 'real and mysterious creature,' not just a simple, predictable machine. 而 Jack 则强烈反对这种观点，他强调，大家现在面对的是一个「真实而神秘的生物」，而不仅仅是一台简单的、可预测的机器。

Jack stated that, like the best fairy tales, this 'creature' was created by ourselves. Our only way out is: Jack 表示，就像最好的童话故事一样，这个「生物」是我们自己创造的。我们唯一的出路是：

To acknowledge its reality, overcome our own fears, and thereby understand it, coexist peacefully with it, and find ways to harness it. 承认它的真实性，克服我们自己的恐惧，从而去理解它、与它和平共处，并找出驾驭它的方法。

item.title: 对标 Sora 2，Google Veo 3.1 视频生成模型迎来重大升级
item.guid: 对标-Sora-2，Google-Veo-3.1-视频生成模型迎来重大升级
item.description:
Google today officially released the Veo 3.1 video generation model update, with significant improvements in both functionality and model performance. Google 今日正式发布 Veo 3.1 视频生成模型更新，在功能与模型层面均有显著提升。

In terms of functionality, Veo 3.1 introduces audio support for the first time for 'material-to-video,' 'frame-to-video,' and 'extension' features, making the creation process more complete. 在功能方面，Veo 3.1 首次为「素材转视频」「帧转视频」和「延展」功能加入音频支持，使创作流程更完整。

Users can not only define characters and styles through multiple reference images but also generate seamless transitions using start and end frames, or extend content generation to over 1 minute. 用户不仅可以通过多张参考图像定义角色与风格，还能利用首尾画面生成无缝过渡，或延展生成超过 1 分钟的内容。

At the model level, Veo 3.1 shows significant progress in prompt understanding and audiovisual quality, resulting in more natural and fluid generations. Notably, the new version supports both horizontal and vertical 16:9 output, better meeting the mainstream demands of current short videos and social media. 在模型层面，Veo 3.1 在提示词理解和视听质量上均有明显进步，生成结果更加自然流畅。值得注意的是，新版本已支持横屏与竖屏 16:9 输出，更符合当前短视频与社交媒体的主流需求。

Additionally, Google's Flow app has added 'insert new element' and 'remove object' features; the former automatically handles lighting and shadows, while the latter can delete unwanted elements and reconstruct the background, further enhancing video editing flexibility. 此外，Google 旗下应用 Flow 也新增「插入新元素」与「移除对象」功能，前者可自动处理光影与阴影，后者则能删除不需要的元素并重建背景，进一步提升视频编辑灵活度。

Currently, Veo 3.1 is available to developers and enterprise users via Gemini API and Vertex AI, and general users can also experience it in the Gemini app. 目前，Veo 3.1 已通过 Gemini API 与 Vertex AI 向开发者和企业用户开放，普通用户也可在 Gemini 应用中体验。

item.title: Claude Haiku 4.5 发布：速度翻倍，价格直降三分之二
item.guid: Claude-Haiku-4.5-发布：速度翻倍，价格直降三分之二
item.description:
Anthropic today officially released its lightweight model, Claude Haiku 4.5. Anthropic 今日正式发布轻量级模型 Claude Haiku 4.5。

Compared to its predecessor, the new model maintains high-level performance while being more than twice as fast and costing one-third of the original price. 相比前代版本，新模型在保持高水准性能的同时，速度提升超过两倍，价格则下降至原来的三分之一。

Official data shows that Haiku 4.5 achieved a score of 73% in the SWE-bench Verified test, which measures AI coding capabilities, placing it at the same level as Claude Sonnet 4 and OpenAI's latest GPT-5. 官方数据显示，在衡量 AI 编码能力的 SWE-bench Verified 测试中，Haiku 4.5 取得了 73% 的成绩，与 Claude Sonnet 4 以及 OpenAI 最新的 GPT-5 处于同一水平。

In some tasks, Haiku 4.5 even surpasses Sonnet 4. 在部分任务中，Haiku 4.5 甚至超越了 Sonnet 4。

In practical application scenarios, Haiku 4.5's low-latency characteristics are particularly suitable for needs such as chat assistants, customer service agents, and pair programming. 在实际应用场景中，Haiku 4.5 的低延迟特性尤其适合聊天助手、客服代理和结对编程等需求。

Developers using Claude Code can also clearly feel the efficiency improvement in multi-agent collaboration and rapid prototype development. 开发者使用 Claude Code 时，也能明显感受到多智能体协作和快速原型开发的效率提升。

In terms of pricing, Haiku 4.5 is priced at $1 per million input tokens and $5 per million output tokens. 价格方面，Haiku 4.5 的定价为每百万输入 token 1 美元、每百万输出 token 5 美元。

Although slightly higher than GPT-5 mini or Google Gemini 2.5 Flash, it is about three times cheaper than Sonnet 4.5, with little performance difference. 虽然相比 GPT-5 mini 或 Google Gemini 2.5 Flash 略高，但与 Sonnet 4.5 相比便宜约三倍，性能差距却不大。

It is worth noting that Anthropic conducted comprehensive safety and alignment tests on Haiku 4.5. The results show that its incidence of undesirable behavior is lower than that of its predecessor, Haiku 3.5, and its overall alignment performance is superior to Sonnet 4.5 and Opus 4.1, and it is considered the safest model in this series to date . 值得注意的是，Anthropic 对 Haiku 4.5 进行了全面的安全性和对齐性测试，结果显示其不良行为发生率低于前代 Haiku 3.5，整体对齐性表现优于 Sonnet 4.5 和 Opus 4.1， 被认为是目前该系列中最安全的模型 。

Currently, Haiku 4.5 has been launched via Claude API, Amazon Bedrock, and Google Cloud Vertex AI, completely replacing Haiku 3.5 and Sonnet 4, becoming the "most cost-effective" choice in Anthropic's product line. 目前，Haiku 4.5 已通过 Claude API、Amazon Bedrock 和 Google Cloud Vertex AI 上线，全面替代 Haiku 3.5 和 Sonnet 4，成为 Anthropic 产品线中「性价比最高」的选择。

item.title: ColorOS 16 正式亮相
item.guid: ColorOS-16-正式亮相
item.description:
On October 15, the 2025 OPPO Developers Conference (ODC25) officially opened today in Shenzhen, where the new ColorOS 16 was released, focusing on OPPO AI's new strategic layout and technological achievements. 10 月 15 日，2025 OPPO 开发者大会（ODC25）今日在深圳正式开幕，大会发布了全新 ColorOS 16，并聚焦 OPPO AI 的全新战略布局与技术成果。

Tang Kai, President of OPPO Software Engineering Business Unit, stated: "Smoothness is the essence of ColorOS, and AI will make ColorOS even better. ColorOS has officially entered the AIOS era. Based on OPPO AI's new technical architecture of new computing, new perception, and new ecosystem, ColorOS 16 will bring users more imaginative AI new experiences. In the future, OPPO will continue to be a leader and popularizer of AI phones, more steadily bringing AI faster into thousands of households." OPPO 软件工程事业部总裁唐凯表示：「流畅是 ColorOS 的本色，AI 将会让 ColorOS 更加出色。ColorOS 已正式进入 AIOS 时代，基于新计算、新感知、新生态的 OPPO AI 全新技术架构，ColorOS16 将为用户带来更多、更有想象力的 AI 新体验。未来，OPPO 也将继续做好 AI 手机的引领者与普及者，更加踏实地让 AI 更快的走进千家万户。」

First, let's look at one of the highlights of this event — ColorOS 16, which brings a brand new smooth technical architecture: 先看本次重点之一 —— ColorOS 16，其带来全新流畅技术架构：

    Brand new Aurora Engine: Android's first seamless architecture, which reshapes the traditional modular architecture of Android, integrating different business modules for seamless drawing and distributed response scheduling, achieving silky smoothness across all scenarios;

    Brand new Tidal Engine: The industry's first chip-level dynamic frame-tracking technology, achieving software-hardware collaborative system-level animation performance optimization, which not only increases system heavy-load fluidity by 37% but also reduces power consumption by 13%;

    Brand new self-developed Star Compiler: Based on the first self-developed Android cross-level fusion compilation technology, it built a complete compilation chain from Java to dedicated hardware from scratch, allowing even mainstream models to achieve top-tier smoothness.

In terms of design, ColorOS 16 introduces a new light field design and incorporates new AI-inspired themes, AI live wallpapers, and AI-inspired copywriting. At the same time, ColorOS 16 also completely breaks down ecological barriers between brands, not only enabling users to answer iPhone calls, messages, and app notifications on OPPO phones but also supporting native experiences such as AirPods instant connection upon opening, native noise cancellation, and spatial audio. 设计方面，ColorOS 16 带来全新光场设计，并加入全新的 AI 灵感主题、AI 实况壁纸、AI 灵感文案。同时 ColorOS 16 还全面打通品牌间的生态隔阂，不仅实现在 OPPO 手机上接听 iPhone 电话、短信以及应用通知，更支持 AirPods 开盖即连、原生降噪以及空间音频等原生体验。

At the conference, OPPO AI's new strategy was also officially announced: "New Computing, New Perception, New Ecosystem." With three major technical foundations — On-Device Compute for edge intelligent computing, PersonaX memory co-existence engine, and Agent Matrix intelligent agent ecosystem framework — OPPO AI will create a smart system that coexists with users, leading personalized AIOS. 大会上，OPPO AI 的全新战略也正式公布：「新计算、新感知、新生态」：以 On-Device Compute 端侧智能计算、PersonaX 记忆共生引擎，以及 Agent Matrix 智能体生态框架三大技术底座，OPPO AI 将打造与用户共生的智慧系统，引领个人化 AIOS。

It is worth mentioning that On-Device Compute is the technical foundation for edge intelligent computing. Through high-density edge models and high-performance inference frameworks, it successfully breaks through the application challenges of multimodal large models on mobile terminals, with peak inference performance reaching 300 tokens/s and a maximum context of 128k. 值得一提的是，On – Device Compute 是端侧智能计算的技术底座，通过高密度端侧模型和高性能推理框架，成功突破多模态大模型在移动终端上的应用难题，推理性能峰值能达 300tokens/s、128k 最长上下文。

PersonaX, as a user-centric multimodal memory engine, relies on a ubiquitous perception system to achieve deep perception and understanding of users' all-time, all-domain, and all-dimensional behaviors, thereby building the core capability of "AI that understands you" driven by lifelong memory. 而 PersonaX 作为一个以用户为中心的多模态记忆引擎，依托泛在感知系统，实现对用户全时、全域、全维度行为的深度感知和理解，进而构建起终身记忆驱动的「懂你 AI」核心能力。

Furthermore, the Agent Matrix intelligent agent ecosystem framework is the core platform for cross-device collaboration among agents, and a key breakthrough for AI agents to upgrade from single-step execution to complex task planning and multi-device linkage, providing users with a seamless, efficient, and intelligent new interactive experience. 另外，Agent Matrix 智能体生态框架是智能体跨设备协同的核心平台，也是 AI 智能体实现从单步执行升级到复杂任务规划与多设备联动的关键突破，能够为用户带来无缝、高效、智能化的全新交互体验。

Empowered by OPPO AI's new strategy, the "AI One-Click Flash Note" on ColorOS 16 also supports "noting images and text, noting videos, and even noting meal pickup codes and accounts," and the new system also brings an AI real-scene dialogue function. 在 OPPO AI 新战略的赋能下，ColorOS 16 上的「AI 一键闪记」还支持了「记图文、记视频，还能记取餐码、记账目」，并且新系统也带来 AI 实景对话功能。

The new ColorOS 16 will be first equipped on upcoming new models such as the OPPO Find X9 series, OPPO Pad 5, OnePlus 15, and OnePlus Ace 6. 全新 ColorOS 16 将率先搭载在即将上市的 OPPO Find X9 系列、OPPO Pad 5、一加 15 以及一加 Ace 6 等新机型。

item.title: 卢伟冰曝 REDMI K90 Pro Max
item.guid: 卢伟冰曝-REDMI-K90-Pro-Max
item.description:
Last night, Lu Weibing, President of Xiaomi Group, revealed during a live broadcast that new phones in the REDMI K series will be released this month. He also disclosed that the K90 series will launch a Pro Max model. 昨晚，小米集团总裁卢伟冰在直播中透露，REDMI K 系列新机将于本月发布。同时其还透露，K90 系列将会推出 Pro Max 机型。

According to "Notebook Check", a Xiaomi model named "Xiaomi 25102RKBEC" has appeared in the GeekBench benchmark database, with a single-core score of 3559 points and a multi-core score of 11060 points. This revised model is expected to be one of the new phones in the REDMI K90 series. 而据「Notebook Check」消息，小米旗下一款名为「Xiaomi 25102RKBEC」的机型现身 GeekBench 跑分库，单核成绩为 3559 分，多核成绩为 11060 分。而改款机型预计将为 REDMI K90 系列的其中一款新机。

According to previous multiple leaks, the REDMI K90 Pro (tentative) will be equipped with Qualcomm's fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 Extreme Edition chip. Its imaging capabilities will be on par with the Xiaomi 17 series, featuring a 50-megapixel Light Hunter 950 main camera, a 50-megapixel ultra-wide-angle lens, and a 50-megapixel periscope telephoto lens. 据此前多方爆料，REDMI K90 Pro（暂定）将搭载高通第五代骁龙 8 至尊版芯片，影像看齐小米 17 系列，配备 5000 万像素的光影猎人 950 主摄、5000 万像素超广角以及一颗 5000 万像素的潜望式长焦镜头。

Additionally, the K90 Pro is expected to feature a large-capacity battery of 7000mAh-7500mAh, supporting 100W wired fast charging and 50W wireless charging. 另外，K90 Pro 还有望搭载 7000mAh-7500mAh 的大容量电池，支持 100W 有线快充与 50W 无线充电。

item.title: 4499 元起，荣耀 Magic 8 系列发布
item.guid: 4499-元起，荣耀-Magic-8-系列发布
item.description:
Last night, Honor officially released its new Magic8 series phones. Let's look at the prices first: 昨晚，荣耀正式发布了旗下 Magic8 系列新机，先看售价：

    Honor Magic8: Starting from 4499 yuan, with configurations starting from 12GB+256GB

    Honor Magic8 Pro: Starting from 5699 yuan, with configurations starting from 12GB+256GB

The new phones continue the design of the previous Magic series, featuring a centered circular camera module and straight metal frames. The Magic8 adopts a 6.58-inch OLED flat screen design; the Magic8 Pro uses a 6.71-inch OLED equal-depth quad-curved screen. 新机外观延续此前 Magic 系列设计，采用居中圆形镜头模组，均为直边金属中框。Magic8 采用 6.58 英寸 OLED 直屏设计；Magic8 Pro 采用 6.71 英寸 OLED 等深四曲屏。

In terms of performance, both Magic8 series models are equipped with Qualcomm's fifth-generation Snapdragon 8 processor, along with Honor's C1+ RF enhancement chip and E2 energy efficiency enhancement chip. Both screens support 120Hz LTPO dynamic refresh rate and 4320Hz PWM dimming, with a peak brightness of 1800nits. 性能方面，Magic8 系列均配备了高通第五代骁龙 8 处理器，配备荣耀 C1+ 射频增强芯片和 E2 能效增强芯片；屏幕均支持 120Hz LTPO 动态刷新率和 4320Hz PWM 调光，峰值亮度为 1800nits。

Regarding battery, the Magic8 features a 7000mAh battery and 90W wired charging, while the Magic8 Pro uses a 7200mAh battery and 120W wired charging. Both new phones support 80W wireless charging. 电池方面，Magic8 采用 7000mAh 电池和 90W 有线充电，Magic8 Pro 采用 7200mAh 电池和 120W 有线充电，新机均支持 80W 无线充电。

In terms of imaging capabilities: 影像能力上：

    Magic8: Features a 50-megapixel 1/1.56″ OIS main camera and a 64-megapixel 1/2″ periscope telephoto lens

    Magic8 Pro: Features a 50-megapixel 1/1.3″ OIS main camera and a 200-megapixel 1/1.4″ periscope telephoto lens (85mm equivalent)

🔗 Related reading: Honor Magic8 Pro Experience: Easy to take great photos, AI understands and acts 🔗 相关阅读： 荣耀 Magic8 Pro 体验：随手就能拍好片，AI 听懂自己办

It's worth mentioning that Honor also officially announced a new form factor phone named "ROBOT PHONE" at this launch event. It features a flip-up multi-axis gimbal rear camera, boasting an AI super brain and the powerful mobility of a robot. 值得一提的是，荣耀还在本次发布会官宣了一款名为「ROBOT PHONE」的新形态手机。其具备一台可翻转的多轴云台后置相机，号称具备 AI 的超强大脑、机器人的超强行动力。

The ROBOT PHONE will be unveiled at the MWC mobile communications conference in Barcelona in 2026. ROBOT PHONE 将会在 2026 年巴塞罗那 MWC 移动通讯大会公布。

item.title: Qwen3-VL 新版本模型上架

Yesterday, Alibaba's Tongyi large model announced the official release of new members of its Qwen3-VL series: the 4B and 8B models. This release includes two parameter scales, 4B and 8B, with both sizes offering Instruct and Thinking versions. 昨天，阿里通义大模型宣布，其正式发布 Qwen3-VL 系列的全新成员——4B 与 8B 模型。本次发布包含了 4B 和 8B 两种参数规模，两个尺寸均提供 Instruct 与 Thinking 版本。

According to the introduction, both the 4B and 8B versions of Qwen3-VL have achieved the following goals: 据介绍，Qwen3-VL 的 4B 和 8B 版本都实现了以下目标：

item.title: 微信不再回收长时间不使用的账号
item.guid: 微信不再回收长时间不使用的账号
item.description:
Yesterday, "WeChat Pay" released its latest podcast episode, where guests including WeChat PR Director "Aunt Zhou" discussed topics such as "Will Moments be reclaimed after a person passes away?" 昨日，「微信派」发布最新一期播客内容，微信公关总监「粥姨」等嘉宾在节目中针对「人去世后，朋友圈会被回收吗？」等话题进行了讨论。

According to WeChat PR Director "Aunt Zhou" in the podcast, the WeChat product team has conducted extensive research and efforts regarding deceased users' accounts. Starting this September, WeChat will no longer reclaim WeChat accounts that have been inactive for a long time. 据微信公关总监「粥姨」在播客中透露，微信产品团队针对逝者账号做了许多研究和努力，从今年 9 月开始，微信对长时间不使用的微信账号已经不再进行回收处理。

According to IT Home, in February this year, "Netizen's father's WeChat account suddenly disappeared years after his death" became a trending topic on Weibo. A netizen posted that his father passed away nearly ten years ago, and when he missed his father, he would open old chat records or look at his father's Moments, but recently he couldn't find his father's WeChat account. 而据 IT 之家报道，今年 2 月，「网友爸爸去世多年微信账号突然消失」登上微博热搜，有网友发帖称，其爸爸去世近十年，想爸爸的时候会打开以前的聊天记录或者去看看爸爸的朋友圈，最近却找不到爸爸的微信了。

After the netizen posted, he replied in the comment section that the post was seen by WeChat staff, who proactively contacted the netizen to try and help retrieve it. However, the netizen's father's account had already been reclaimed, and once reclaimed, it cannot be recovered. Nevertheless, the netizen was still very grateful to the staff. 该网友发帖后，在评论区回复时其称，上述帖文被微信工作人员看到了，工作人员主动联系网友试着帮忙找回，但网友爸爸账号已经被回收，一旦被回收就无法找回了，不过网友还是很感谢工作人员。

item.title: 《逆水寒》将联动宇树科技
item.guid: 《逆水寒》将联动宇树科技
item.description:
According to IT Home, NetEase's mobile game "Justice" recently officially announced that its brand-new major expansion pack "Crossing Mountains" is officially scheduled for October 31st. 据 IT 之家消息，网易旗下《逆水寒》手游日前官宣，全新大资料片《越关山》正式定档 10 月 31 日。

It is understood that this autumn's major expansion pack "Crossing Mountains" also marks the start of the 3.2 major season, bringing multiple new gameplay features and content: 据悉本次秋季大资料片《越关山》也是 3.2 大赛季开启之时，将带来多项玩法、内容：

    New Treasure Hunting Gameplay: In the new treasure hunting gameplay "Treasure Hunt in the Vast Sea," players will transform into treasure hunters, delving into perilous environments to seek treasures. Hidden passages abound, wealth is scattered everywhere, and powerful bosses guard rare items. Engage in resource competition, where "open attacks and covert schemes" against other players are all viable strategies. Upon death, all treasures carried by the player will be directly dropped.

    With the launch of numerous major new contents such as new gameplay, new dungeons, new storylines, and new maps, the new expansion pack also offers multiple welfare rewards for players to obtain, including at least 10 fashion sets, 10+ mounts, and over 40 appearances, all available for free.

    New Map "Guanshan": Players will wield their swords to traverse mountains and rivers, using the unique exploration gameplay "Slash" to shatter peaks and rocks, and defeat enemies; they can also unlock the "Sword Riding" experience, soaring through the air to overlook magnificent landscapes, allowing their sword intent to resonate with heaven and earth.

    AI Companion Intelligence Upgrade, Unitree Robotics Collaboration Activated: After the new expansion pack update, players can enable the voice switch when traveling with companions, not only allowing real-time voice chat with companions but also enabling companions to understand player commands and act upon them. Additionally, Unitree Robotics collaboration will be activated in the new expansion pack, where Blood River puppies meet "mechanical puppies."

item.title: 小米入局短剧赛道
item.guid: 小米入局短剧赛道
item.description:
Recently, Xiaomi launched an independent short-form drama app "Weiguan Short Dramas" on its mobile app store, featuring "ad-free massive short dramas for free viewing," with downloads reaching 20,000. 日前，小米在旗下手机应用商城上线独立短剧 App「围观短剧」，主打「无广告海量短剧免费看」，下载量达 2 万人次。

According to the app's detailed page, "Weiguan Short Dramas" was developed by Chengdu Share Information Communication Co., Ltd. Through equity penetration, it can be seen that the company is 100% owned by Beijing Ju'ailiao Network Technology Co., Ltd., which is wholly owned by Xiaomi Group. 据 App 详细页介绍，「围观短剧」由成都分享信息传播有限公司开发，经股权穿透可见，该公司由小米集团全资持有的北京聚爱聊网络科技有限公司 100% 持股。

It is worth mentioning that its legal representative, Wang Chuan, also holds core positions such as co-founder, senior vice president, and chief strategy officer of Xiaomi Group. 值得一提的是，其法定代表人王川，亦同时担任小米集团联合创始人、高级副总裁及首席战略官等核心职务。

However, this is not Xiaomi's first foray into the short-form drama sector. In July this year, Xiaomi's REDMI collaborated with Douyin and Wanhe Tianyi to produce its first short drama, "Temporal Partners." Former Xiaomi China Market General Manager, Redmi General Manager Wang Teng, and Redmi Product Manager Hu Xinxin, among others, personally participated in the acting. 但这并非小米第一次触碰短剧赛道。今年 7 月，小米旗下 REDMI 就联合抖音、万合天宜出品首部短剧《时空合作人》。前小米中国区市场总经理、Redmi 总经理王腾和 Redmi 产品经理胡馨心等曾下场亲自参演。

According to analysis reported by Cailian Press, from brand-customized short dramas to the launch of an independent app, it indicates that Xiaomi's strategy in the short-form drama sector is shifting from a mere marketing tool to an upgrade in content ecosystem construction. 据财联社报道分析，从品牌定制短剧到独立 App 上线，表明小米在短剧领域的布局正从单纯的营销手段，转向内容生态构建升级。

This shift may mean that Xiaomi is no longer content with merely exposing content on external platforms, but is attempting to build its own content platform to keep users within its own ecosystem, thereby exploring full-chain capabilities from content production and distribution to user operations. 这一转变或意味着，小米不再满足于仅在外部平台进行内容曝光，而是试图通过自建内容平台，将用户留在自身生态内，从而探索从内容生产、分发到用户运营的全链路能力。

item.title: 《捕风追影》将于 12 月日本上映
item.guid: 《捕风追影》将于-12-月日本上映
item.description:
Recently, the film "Catching the Wind and Chasing Shadows" announced its release in Japan on December 12, and released its Japanese trailer. 日前，电影《捕风追影》宣布将于 12 月 12 日日本上映，并发布日版预告。

The film tells the story of a group of genius thieves who stole hundreds of millions in assets and successfully escaped the police's "Sky Eye" system tracking with their superb anti-reconnaissance capabilities. When the Macao Judiciary Police Bureau had no other options, they invited back Huang Dezhong, a tracking expert who had retired for many years, to lead a "mysterious tracking team," including young police officer He Qiuguo, to engage in a high-IQ cat-and-mouse game with the mastermind Fu Longsheng. 影片讲述了一伙天才盗匪劫走数亿资产，并凭借高超反侦察能力成功逃脱警方「天眼」系统追踪。澳门司警局无计可施之际，请回隐退多年的跟踪专家黄德忠，带领包括年轻司警何秋果在内的「神秘跟踪队」，与幕后主谋傅隆生展开高智商猫鼠博弈。

The film is directed by Yang Zi, starring Jackie Chan, Zhang Zifeng, Tony Leung Ka-fai, Ci Sha, Wen Junhui, and others. Its cumulative box office in mainland China has currently exceeded 1.25 billion. 该片由杨子执导，成龙、张子枫、梁家辉、此沙、文俊辉等主演，目前大陆累计票房已突破 12.50 亿。

item.title: 聚焦莫扎特，《阿玛多伊斯》首曝预告
item.guid: 聚焦莫扎特，《阿玛多伊斯》首曝预告
item.description:
According to Sina Movies, the first trailer for the new drama "Amadeus," focusing on the legendary composer Mozart, has been released and will air on Sky this December. 据新浪电影消息，聚焦传奇作曲家莫扎特的新剧《阿玛多伊斯》（Amadeus）首曝预告，将于今年 12 月 Sky 播出。

The series will star Tomohiro Fukuda as Mozart, Paul Bettany as the jealous court composer Salieri, Gabriella Crivelli as Mozart's wife Constanze, and Joe Barton ("Giri/Haji") as the screenwriter. 剧集将由福田知盛饰演莫扎特，保罗·贝坦尼饰演充满嫉妒心的宫廷作曲家萨列里，加布瑞拉·克里维饰演莫扎特的妻子康斯坦茨，乔·巴顿(《黑鸽》)编剧。

The drama is adapted from Peter Shaffer's classic play of the same name and will "detail and explore the famous rivalry between the two composers." 该剧改编自彼得·谢弗的同名经典戏剧，将「详述、探究两个作曲家之间著名的竞争」。

item.title: 电影《用武之地》定档跨年档
item.guid: 电影《用武之地》定档跨年档
item.description:
Recently, the film "A Place to Use Force" officially announced its release on December 31 and released its official poster. 日前，电影《用武之地》官宣定档 12 月 31 日并发布定档海报。

The film is adapted from the true self-rescue experience of overseas hostage survivors. Overseas journalist Ma Xiao and volunteer doctor Pan Wenjia, a married couple, were kidnapped by an extremist organization due to a sudden change in the situation while accompanying engineer Miao Feng to repair a base station in the suburbs. In prison, they met overseas Chinese businessman Zhou Weijie. Facing the threat of a five-million-dollar ransom per person, they embarked on an extreme escape amidst the war. 该片根据境外人质幸存者真实自救经历改编，驻外记者马笑和志愿医生潘文佳夫妇在陪同工程师苗峰赴郊区修理基站的途中因局势突变遭极端组织绑架，并在狱中结识华侨商人周伟杰，面对每人五百万美金赎金的威胁，众人在战乱中展开极限逃亡。

The film is produced by Ning Hao, directed by Shen Ao, written by Shen Ao and Xu Luyang, and stars Xiao Yang, Qi Xi, Simon Yam, and Zheng Kai. 影片由由宁浩监制，申奥执导，申奥、许渌洋编剧，肖央、齐溪、任达华、郑恺领衔主演。
